subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] First Successful Recordings
author: bruce halliday

Aaron,
 
You could get a larger speaker for the old 469 it will give you h=
igher volume
and I don't know if your aware that the speaker or headphones =
act as the antenna
for the radio.
 
I personally won't use the new 469 beca=
use of the clicking on AM and I don't
ever use FM on any of my boxes for th=
e reason that FM is cosiderablly more
cluttered with noise than AM and it i=
s harder to hear or discern real time communication.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday=
 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: a.cronk@...: Sat, 12 Apr 200=
8 12:30:15 -0400Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] First Successful Recordings




Hey =
Bruce, Thanks for offering to help. I've been on the list for a couple of w=
eeks, but just started to get involved. I've gone over many files on the li=
st and listen to the new ones that are posted, so I can get accustomed to w=
hat I am trying to listen for. I've done paranormal research in the past (I=
 have all kinds of equipment, emf detectors, cameras, infrared thermometers=
, dowsing rods, etc, and am looking to expand even further), and have gotte=
n a few traditional EVPs that I will post in my folder later. I am actually=
 in Lutz, Florida. Its just slightly north of Tampa, Florida (right on the =
city limits. If anyone wants to meet up, let me know, I'm up for it), so my=
 reception isn't too bad. I was using the radio next to a computer, a tv, a=
nd a few other EMF emitting devices. I never considered the interference fr=
om those when doing my session. In addition to the newer 12-469 model, I fo=
und the older model and played with it for a lil bit, but it doesn't compar=
e to the newer one. The volume is lower and the reception on that one is mu=
ch worse. Is there anyway I can improve volume and/or the signal on the old=
er one to make it work better? I know at Radioshack they have a few things =
to boost volume. I used to work at RadioShack, and it kills me everytime I =
buy something from there and can't get my old 30% employee discount. Lol. O=
nce again, thanks for the help.-Aaron
On Sat, Apr 12, 2008 at 11:38 AM, bru=
ce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:





Hi Aaron, My =
name is bruce I am a long time box researcher. Congradulations on your firs=
t session with the 469.I heard your files as you did. One suggestion, you a=
re not getting any signal. When I listened to yourfiles you do not hear the=
 box sweeping through the stations as it should, all that is heard is white=
 noisewhich means that your reception of radio signal is very poor. In orde=
r for you to get those responses with that type of signal means the spirit =
sending them worked extra hard to grad a fragment of signal to form even th=
ose one sylable words. If your signal can be enhanced you will recieve a 10=
00x better communication. When the box sweeps it should sound like you are =
turning the tuning knob on a radio across the band. Youshould hear intermit=
ent static or white noise only between the stations not a constant stream o=
f it. If you can let me know your situation ie location in proximity to a c=
ity, when listening to the regular radio what gives better reception your A=
M or FM?Do you have any appliances or your computer in the location where y=
ou did the session? Appliances like computer moniters, lamps, space heaters=
, tv setsMicrowave ovens, cuircut breaker boxes, electric conduit and many =
other things can emmit high ammounts of emf and that will disrupt and block=
 yoursignal reception. Let me know the conditions during your session and I=
 can help you improve the situation. Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.comFrom: a.cronk@...: Sat, 12 Apr 2008 03:53:40 +0000Su=
bject: [EVP-ITC] First Successful Recordings


I got my first successful re=
corded responses tonight. My firstresponse was when I first got my radio an=
d tested it out.Unfortunately I wasn't recording. I could have sworn that a=
fter I saidHi and introduced myself that someone said "Hi Aaron." Anyways, =
Iposted the files in Aaron's Files under 12-469 New model. The link is http=
://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Aaron%27s%20Files/12-469%20New=
%20Model/-Aaron

More immediate than e-mail? Get instant access with Window=
s Live Messenger.
